pinyin: Zhan4 jiang1 Shi1 fan4 Xue2 yuan4
Han2 shan1 Shi1 fan4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: She is a student of a teachers college.
sentences.chinese: 她是师范学院的一名学生。

sentences.english: The type specimen is deposited in Shenyang Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 模式标本保存于沈阳师范学院昆虫研究所。

sentences.english: He was graduated from a normal college.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个师范学院的毕业生。

sentences.english: The school is attached to the Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校附属于师范学院。

sentences.english: Why do you want to study at Christchurch College of Education?
sentences.chinese: 请问您为什么要到新西兰的基督城师范学院学习？

sentences.english: I'm a third year student in Huanggang Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 我是黄冈师范学院一名大三的学生。

sentences.english: Chen Liji, who has graduated from the Huaian Normal University, has serious experiences in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 陈丽吉毕业于淮阴师范学院，有丰富的英语教学经验。

sentences.english: Amy, graduated from Huaiyin Normal University, major in Business English, with great inters in teaching.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于淮阴师范学院商务英语专业。

sentences.english: I am a student of Biology department, Hubei Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 我是湖北师范学院生物系的一名学生。

sentences.english: Is the Vat Bajay Monastery tantamount to a teachers' college?
sentences.chinese: 那这总佛寺不就相当于师范学院了嘛。

sentences.english: My daughter is a student at a teachers' college.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿是一名师范学院的学生。

pinyin: Shan3 xi1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

definition: University of Science and Engineering/also sometimes Institute of Technology
abbr. for 師範大學|师范大学[shi1 fan4 da4 xue2], normal university/teacher training college

pinyin: Xi1 an1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2
Han2 shan1 Shi1 fan4 Xue2 yuan4
